title: Text Encryption & Decryption (AES PKCS7)
description: Python utility that encrypts and decrypts text files using AES with PKCS7 padding.

title: Cyber Security Dictionary
description: Glossary-style web app that organizes cybersecurity terms and definitions for quick lookup.

title: Population of Canadian Provinces
description: Data visualization site that animates province population trends over decades using StatCan data.

title: Art Generator
description: Creative toolkit that blends Python and JavaScript to generate algorithmic art patterns.

title: Text Translator
description: CLI-style translator that uses googletrans to turn short phrases into new languages.

title: Password Generator
description: Configurable password generator with strength cues and custom character sets.

title: Web Game Selection
description: Collection of bite-sized browser games packaged into a single HTML experience.
